job_tasks.phrase: working on an application landscape that supports over thirty thousand customer calls every day.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the context of building and maintaining a large-scale application landscape, which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously improving our voicebot to better serve our customers when they call us, using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.
job_tasks.justification: Improving a voicebot and integrating AI features into it falls under developing and integrating software with AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
job_tasks.justification: This relates to aligning technical work with business objectives, a common software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us.
job_tasks.justification: Using and sharing knowledge about development technologies is a standard software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Devising practical solutions in a team setting is a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
job_tasks.justification: Participating in technical discussions and providing input is part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: You don't mind picking up test-automation and test-management activities;
job_tasks.justification: Test automation and management are integral parts of software development to ensure quality.

job_tasks.phrase: You ensure that we continuously improve in terms of code quality and architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on code quality and architecture is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: using a combination of traditional Natural Language Processing and Generative AI-based features.
job_tasks.justification: While the integration is software development, the mention of using NLP and GenAI features implies some level of understanding or application of these models, leaning towards model development/usage.

soft_skills.phrase: The end-user is always number one! In the back of your head, you're always keeping this in mind. You strive to come up with ways to continuously achieve the objectives of the Rabobank;
You use the latest development technologies and would love to share your stack with us. You're constantly eager to experiment with- and learn new techniques;

Together with the team (DevOps, Product Owner, Business Analyst, UX designer, Scrum Master and architect) you'll devise practical solutions. You'll have an active role in participating in technical discussion where you may give your input or advice to the rest of the team;
You have fun in everything you do!

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as working on an application landscape, improving a voicebot, devising practical solutions with a team, test automation, and focusing on code quality and architecture. While it mentions 'Generative AI-based features' and 'traditional Natural Language Processing', the core responsibilities and required skills are rooted in software development and integration, with AI/ML being a component integrated into the application rather than the primary focus of model development or specialization. The technologies listed are primarily related to cloud platforms, CI/CD, and specific conversational AI tools (Power Virtual Agents, Copilot Studio), reinforcing the integration aspect.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines many software engineering responsibilities and lists specific technologies. However, the depth of involvement with Generative AI itself (beyond integration) is not explicitly detailed, making it slightly less definitive than a role solely focused on model building. The mention of 'traditional Natural Language Processing' alongside Generative AI suggests a blend, but the overall framing leans towards application development.
